name: Smart Text Field
description:
**Specs and interactions are based on Material Design

** this is a medium-sized outline text-field


Smart components are here to supercharge your work-flow and allow you to design & prototype life-like interactions in figma at super fast speeds.


Components can be easily adapted to any context in moments with built-in variants, interactions and add-ons.
